    • updatePlayerCardsMap

      public void updatePlayerCardsMap(int placingCardId, CornerCard placingCard, CornerCard tableCard, int tableCardId, CornerPos tableCornerPos, Side placingCardSide) throws WrongInstanceTypeException
      Place the card on the player board
      Parameters:
      placingCardId - ID of the card to place
      placingCard - Card to be placed
      tableCard - Card on the board
      tableCardId - ID of the card on the board
      tableCornerPos - Corner position of the board card to which link the placing card
      placingCardSide - Side of placing of the placing card
      Throws:
      WrongInstanceTypeException - Card not placeable

    • initializeBoard

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard(int placingCardId, int tableCardId, CornerPos tableCornerPos)
      Update the board after a card is placed
      Parameters:
      placingCardId - ID of the placed card
      tableCardId - ID of the card on the player board
      tableCornerPos - Corner position of the board card to which the new card is linked
